body_html: Regarding the method used by @harpone, the example given only shows how to do this if the gradient can be defined in pure TensorFlow. How would you go ahead if both the function and its gradient should be computed with e.g. numpy?
body_text: Regarding the method used by @harpone, the example given only shows how to do this if the gradient can be defined in pure TensorFlow. How would you go ahead if both the function and its gradient should be computed with e.g. numpy?
body: Regarding the method used by @harpone, the example given only shows how to do this if the gradient can be defined in pure TensorFlow. How would you go ahead if both the function and its gradient should be computed with e.g. numpy?
